Stop.name: react-native-web-type-check
Stop.description: Validates TypeScript types in React Native Web projects before stopping

hooks.command: npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with package.json --test-dir "grep -qE '\"react-native-web\":' package.json" -- npx tsc --noEmit

SubagentStop.name: react-native-web-type-check
SubagentStop.description: Validates TypeScript types in React Native Web projects when agents complete

hooks.command: npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with package.json --test-dir "grep -qE '\"react-native-web\":' package.json" -- npx tsc --noEmit
